metadata.title: VStack - Professional VPS Hosting Solutions
metadata.description: Discover reliable and affordable VPS hosting with VStack. Enjoy dedicated resources, SSD/NVMe storage, and 24/7 expert support. Perfect for websites, applications, and development.
metadata.keywords: VPS hosting, cloud servers, SSD VPS, NVMe VPS, affordable VPS, reliable VPS, web hosting, virtual private server

plans.title: VPS Plans - VStack
plans.description: Choose from our flexible VPS hosting plans with SSD/NVMe storage, dedicated resources, and 24/7 support. Perfect for websites, applications, and development.
plans.keywords: VPS plans, VPS pricing, cloud server plans, SSD VPS, NVMe VPS, hosting plans

support.title: Support Center - VStack
support.description: Get help with your VPS hosting services. Access documentation, submit tickets, and contact our 24/7 technical support team.
support.keywords: VPS support, technical support, hosting help, documentation, customer service

dashboard.title: Dashboard - VStack
dashboard.description: Manage your VPS servers, monitor performance, and access all your hosting services from one centralized dashboard.
dashboard.keywords: VPS dashboard, server management, hosting control panel, VPS monitoring

login.title: Login - VStack
login.description: Access your VStack account to manage your VPS servers, billing, and hosting services.
login.keywords: VPS login, hosting login, account access, server management login

register.title: Sign Up - VStack
register.description: Create your VStack account and start your VPS hosting journey with reliable cloud servers and expert support.
register.keywords: VPS signup, hosting registration, create account, VPS hosting account

hero.title: Professional VPS Hosting Solutions
hero.subtitle: Get reliable cloud servers with dedicated resources, SSD/NVMe storage, and 24/7 expert support. Perfect for websites, applications, and development.

features.title: Key Features
features.description: Discover the essential features that make our VPS hosting stand out
features.support_desc: Expert technical support available around the clock
features.security_desc: Advanced security measures to protect your data
features.backup_desc: Automated daily backups for peace of mind

popular_plans.title: Popular VPS Plans
popular_plans.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your needs

advantages.title: Why Choose Our VPS Hosting?
advantages.description: We provide enterprise-grade infrastructure with unmatched performance, reliability, and support to power your applications

items.title: Lightning Fast Setup
items.description: Get your VPS up and running in under 60 seconds with our automated deployment system.

items.title: Premium Hardware
items.description: High-performance SSD and NVMe storage with latest generation processors for maximum speed.

items.title: Best Value Pricing
items.description: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees. Scale up or down anytime without long-term contracts.

items.title: Full Root Access
items.description: Complete control over your server environment with root access and custom configurations.

plans.title: Choose Your VPS Plan
plans.subtitle: Scalable, reliable, and high-performance VPS hosting solutions for every need

footer.description: Professional VPS hosting solutions with 99.9% uptime guarantee. Scale your business with our reliable cloud infrastructure and 24/7 support.
footer.24_7_desc: Our technical support team is available around the clock to help you.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Please check the URL or navigate back to the homepage.
notFound.whyTitle: Why am I seeing this page?
reasons: The page you're looking for doesn't exist
The page has been moved or deleted
You might not have permission to access this page

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized Access
unauthorized.subtitle: You don't have permission to access this page. Please log in or contact the administrator for support.
unauthorized.whyTitle: Why am I seeing this page?
reasons: You are not logged into the system
Your account doesn't have access rights

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.subtitle: We apologize, but an unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
reasons: Refresh the page and try again
Clear your browser cache and cookies
Contact support if the problem persists
